title: LOL Movie Rioters Please Read
body:
Hi there.
I just had a general question about someting that is interesting and would seem great to have. 
Many popular game franchises such as World of Warcraft and Final fantasy have released movies based on the lore of their games. I was wondering if league of legends will ever see such a film made as the lore we have is soo in depth and very interesting with many unique theories based on them. To have a movie about it would be great in my opinion. Currently all we have is small teasers which are great but a movie based on lore would be amazing.

Your Opinions.
Rioters please do tell if the game would ever develop something of this type or if you have considered it.
Thanks
